day0.subject: Welcome to Work.krd — Let's Build Your Resume!
day0.preheader: Your free account is ready. Create a professional resume in minutes.
day0.title: Welcome to Work.krd!
day0.body: Thank you for joining Work.krd — the AI-powered resume builder designed for professionals in Kurdistan and the Middle East.
day0.body2: Your free account is ready with everything you need to create a standout resume:

features.f1: Professional templates with full Kurdish, Arabic & English support
features.f2: AI-powered content suggestions to write compelling descriptions
features.f3: ATS optimization to pass automated screening systems
features.f4: Export as a polished A4 PDF — ready to send to employers

day0.closing: We're here to help you land your dream job. Let's get started!

day2.subject: Quick Tip: Start With a Template
day2.preheader: Choose a professional template and let AI help you fill it in.
day2.title: A Great Resume Starts With the Right Template
day2.body: Not sure where to begin? Here's the fastest way to create a professional resume:

steps.s1: Pick a template that matches your industry and style
steps.s2: Fill in your details — our AI helps you write each section
steps.s3: Download your ATS-optimized PDF and start applying

day2.body2: Most of our users finish their first resume in under 15 minutes.
day2.closing: Need help? Just reply to this email — we're happy to assist.

day7.subject: Let AI Write Your Professional Summary
day7.preheader: Our AI generates tailored content for your resume in seconds.
day7.title: Let AI Do the Hard Part
day7.body: Writing about yourself is tough. That's why we built AI-powered content generation right into the resume builder.
day7.body2: Here's what our AI can help you with:

features.f1: Professional summaries tailored to your target role
features.f2: Compelling job descriptions based on your experience
features.f4: Content in English, Arabic, or Kurdish

day7.closing: You have {aiCredits} AI suggestions remaining on your free plan. Make them count!

day14.subject: Your Resume Could Be Getting More Interviews
day14.preheader: Use ATS optimization to make sure your resume gets seen by hiring managers.
day14.title: Are You Getting Past the ATS?
day14.body: Did you know that most companies use Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) to filter resumes before a human ever sees them?
day14.body2: Work.krd's ATS Optimization tool analyzes your resume and tells you exactly what to fix:

features.f1: Get an ATS compatibility score for your resume
features.f2: See which keywords are missing for your target role
features.f3: Follow actionable suggestions to improve your score
features.f4: Match your resume against specific job descriptions

day14.proTip: Pro users get unlimited ATS checks and access to all premium templates.

abandoned.subject: Your Resume Is Waiting for You
abandoned.preheader: You started something great — come back and finish your resume.
abandoned.title: Don't Leave Your Resume Unfinished
abandoned.body: We noticed you started working on your resume but haven't finished it yet. Your progress is saved and waiting for you.
abandoned.body3: Completing your resume only takes a few more minutes. Our AI can help you fill in the remaining sections quickly.

tips.title: Quick tips to finish faster:
tips.t1: Use AI to generate your professional summary
tips.t2: Add skills from our suggested list — no typing needed
tips.t3: Preview your PDF to see how it looks before downloading

abandoned.closing: Your dream job is just a completed resume away.

30d.subject: We Miss You! Your Resume Builder Awaits
30d.preheader: It's been a while — come back and update your resume.
30d.title: Time to Refresh Your Resume?
30d.body: It's been 30 days since your last visit to Work.krd. A lot can change in a month — is your resume up to date?
30d.body2: Here are a few reasons to update your resume now:

reasons.r1: New skills or certifications to add
reasons.r2: Recent projects or achievements worth highlighting
reasons.r3: Job market changes that require updated keywords
reasons.r4: New templates and features we've added since your last visit

30d.closing: Keeping your resume current means you're always ready when opportunity knocks.

60d.subject: New Templates & Features — Come See What's New
60d.preheader: We've been busy making Work.krd even better for you.
60d.title: We've Made Some Improvements
60d.body: It's been a couple of months since we last saw you on Work.krd. We've been working hard to improve the platform, and we think you'll love what's new.
60d.offer: As a returning user, your previous resumes and data are still saved and ready for you.

90d.subject: Still Looking? Let's Help You Land That Job
90d.preheader: A fresh resume could be the key to your next opportunity.
90d.title: A Fresh Start for Your Job Search
90d.body: It's been 3 months since your last visit. Whether you're actively job searching or just keeping your options open, a polished resume is your best tool.
90d.body2: Here's what you can do in just 10 minutes:

actions.a1: Refresh your existing resume with updated info
actions.a2: Try a new template for a fresh look
actions.a3: Use AI to rewrite your summary for a new target role
actions.a4: Run an ATS check against a job description you're interested in

90d.body3: Your account and all your data are still safe and waiting for you.
